articles.author: Simon Kuper
articles.title: Trump's awful truth: the US can go it alone - Financial Times
articles.description: He intuits something important about Americans. Their scariest enemies are within
articles.content: One night in June 1942, a German U-boat dropped four Nazi saboteurs on a Hamptons beach. They took a train to New York, where their leader, George John Dasch, informed the FBI about them. Four other … [+4508 chars]
